00051 // fwd-decl xed_simple_flag_t;

00054 
00055 struct xed_encoder_vars_s;
00056 struct xed_decoder_vars_s;
00057 
00063 typedef struct xed_decoded_inst_s  {
00065     xed_operand_values_t _operands[XED_OPERAND_LAST]; // FIXME: can further squeeze down 16b units
00066 
00067 #if defined(XED_ENCODER)
00069     xed_uint8_t _operand_order[XED_ENCODE_ORDER_MAX_OPERANDS];
00070 #endif
00071     xed_uint8_t _decoded_length;
00073     xed_uint8_t _n_operand_order; 
00074 
00078     const xed_inst_t* _inst;
00079 
00080     // decoder does not change it, encoder does    
00081     union {
00082         xed_uint8_t* _enc;
00083         const xed_uint8_t* _dec;
00084     } _byte_array; 
00085 
00086     // These are stack allocated by xed_encode() or xed_decode(). These are
00087     // per-encode or per-decode transitory data.
00088     union {
00089 
00090         /* user_data is available as a user data storage field after
00091          * decoding. It does not live across re-encodes or re-decodes. */
00092         xed_uint64_t user_data; 
00093 #if defined(XED_ENCODER)
00094         struct xed_encoder_vars_s* ev;
00095 #endif
00096     } u;
00097 
00098 
00099     union {
00100         xed_int8_t  byte;
00101         xed_int16_t word;
00102         xed_int32_t dword;
00103         xed_int64_t qword;
00104     } disp_val;
00105 
00106     
00107 } xed_decoded_inst_t;
00108

00118 static XED_INLINE xed_bool_t xed_decoded_inst_valid(const xed_decoded_inst_t* p ) {
00119     return XED_STATIC_CAST(xed_bool_t,(p->_inst != 0));
00120 }
00123 static XED_INLINE const xed_inst_t* xed_decoded_inst_inst( const xed_decoded_inst_t* p) {
00124     return p->_inst;
00125 }

00131     xed_assert(p->_inst != 0);
00132     return xed_inst_category(p->_inst);
00133 }

00137     xed_assert(p->_inst != 0);
00138     return xed_inst_extension(p->_inst);
00139 }
00142 static XED_INLINE xed_isa_set_enum_t xed_decoded_inst_get_isa_set( const xed_decoded_inst_t* p) {
00143     xed_assert(p->_inst != 0);
00144     return xed_inst_isa_set(p->_inst);

00149     xed_assert(p->_inst != 0);
00150     return xed_inst_iclass(p->_inst);

00267 static XED_INLINE void  xed_decoded_inst_set_mode(xed_decoded_inst_t* p,
00268                                                   xed_machine_mode_enum_t mmode,
00269                                                   xed_address_width_enum_t stack_addr_width) {
00270     xed_state_t dstate;
00271     dstate.mmode = mmode;
00272     dstate.stack_addr_width = stack_addr_width;
00273     xed_operand_values_set_mode(p->_operands, &dstate);
00274 }

00320 xed_decoded_inst_inc_length(xed_decoded_inst_t* p) {
00321     return p->_decoded_length++;

00333 static XED_INLINE xed_uint8_t
00334 xed_decoded_inst_get_byte(const xed_decoded_inst_t* p, xed_uint_t byte_index)
00335 {
00337     xed_uint8_t out = p->_byte_array._dec[byte_index];
00338     return out;
00339 }

00348 static XED_INLINE xed_uint_t xed_decoded_inst_get_machine_mode_bits(const xed_decoded_inst_t* p) {
00349     if (p->_operands[XED_OPERAND_MODE] == 2) return 64;
00350     if (p->_operands[XED_OPERAND_MODE] == 1) return 32;
00351     return 16;
00352 }
00356 static XED_INLINE xed_uint_t xed_decoded_inst_get_stack_address_mode_bits(const xed_decoded_inst_t* p) {
00357     if (p->_operands[XED_OPERAND_SMODE] == 2) return 64;
00358     if (p->_operands[XED_OPERAND_SMODE] == 1) return 32;
00359     return 16;
00360 }

00371 static XED_INLINE xed_chip_enum_t xed_decoded_inst_get_input_chip(const xed_decoded_inst_t* p) {
00372     return XED_STATIC_CAST(xed_chip_enum_t,p->_operands[XED_OPERAND_CHIP]);
00373 }
00374 
00377 static XED_INLINE void xed_decoded_inst_set_input_chip(xed_decoded_inst_t* p,  xed_chip_enum_t chip) {
00378     p->_operands[XED_OPERAND_CHIP] = chip;
00379 }

00407 static XED_INLINE unsigned int xed_decoded_inst_get_iform_enum_dispatch(const xed_decoded_inst_t* p) {
00408     xed_assert(p->_inst != 0);
00409     return xed_inst_iform_enum(p->_inst) - xed_iform_first_per_iclass(xed_inst_iclass(p->_inst));
00410 }
